definition: to kill/to murder/to attack/to weaken or reduce/to smart (dialect)/(used after a verb) extremely

sentences.english: In the dazzling image of what is often hidden murderous?
sentences.chinese: 在眼花繚亂的表象之中往往暗藏何種殺機？

sentences.english: It'll be the first time Adele will sing "Skyfall" live for an audience.
sentences.chinese: 這將是阿黛爾首次在現場傾情演繹歌曲《天降殺機》。

sentences.english: When 2 people drink blood wine to do obeisance a son, each other already the heart hide intention to murder.
sentences.chinese: 兩人喝血酒拜把子之時，彼此已經心藏殺機。

sentences.english: They were full of envy, murder, strife, deceit, maliciousness.
sentences.chinese: 他們妒忌，滿懷殺機，熱中紛爭，欺詐，用心險惡。

sentences.english: Her second book The Secret Adversary followed in 1922.
sentences.chinese: 1922年，她的第二本書《暗藏殺機》問世。

sentences.english: Mr. White bares the iron teeth behind his smile.
sentences.chinese: 懷特先生滿臉笑容，背後卻隱藏殺機。

definition: to be shocked/to be appalled/to be terrified
overwhelmed with shock, horror or amazement/dumbstruck/aghast
lit. hiding the sky and covering the earth (idiom); fig. earth-shattering/omnipresent/of universal importance
a thousand pounds hangs by a thread (idiom)/imminent peril/a matter of life or death
